prompts: Create a cute, round Pokémon that sings lullabies to put others to sleep.
I want a tiny, pink Pokémon with big eyes and a bubbly personality.
Generate a Pokémon that can charm opponents with its melodic voice and round shape.
Make a playful fairy-type Pokémon that loves to dance and entertain its friends.
Imagine a Pokémon with a soft, plushy body that resembles a balloon.
Design a Pokémon that thrives in grassy areas and enjoys singing under the stars.
Give me a small, chubby Pokémon that can use its singing skills in battles.

distinctive_features: Curly tuft of hair on top
